titleStmt.title: Great news from Scotland and London-derry in Ireland being a full and true relation of a great and signal victory, which the Protestants there have most happily obtain'd over the French and Irish-papists, and of the landing of Major General Kirk, and his army, June 25th, 1689.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: Slightly faded, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
